scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev -w client" "npm run dev -w server"
scripts.dev:stop: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ports=5391,3206; $conns=Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $ports -contains $_.LocalPort }; if($conns){$conns | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }}"
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:stop && npm run dev
